inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getNetworkInterfaces.

filters.description:
Custom filter block as described below.

More complex filters can be expressed using one or more `filter` sub-blocks,
which take the following arguments:

tags.description:
Map of tags, each pair of which must exactly match
a pair on the desired network interfaces.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getNetworkInterfaces.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

ids.description: List of all the network interface ids found.
